title: Yosemite National Park
name: White Wolf
price: Rates are $67 per night for tent cabins, and $91 per night for cabins with bath

reviews.content: Read this review, all that you need to know!       This is what they make you look like if you get a photo shoot!
reviews.author: Miss Casey Abbott

description: Located along the Tioga Pass Road, White Wolf is open from July through September and offers 24 tent cabins and 4 cabins with private bath.  The tent cabins are wood frame on a raised wooden platform and include beds, linen, and a wood stove.
